What is B.Voc?

Introduction of B.Voc (bachelor of vocation)

  • You have just cleared your board exam. What we want to talk about today is for class 12th students about the awesome best degree program after class 12th. All of you are thinking about what to do next in the bar and get a strong degree, but very few students know that there is one of the best degrees after class 12, its name is Bachelor of Vocation (B.Voc).

  • So what is B.Voc? Why is it best?Why should we have to do B.voc? How is it different from other degrees? Where does B.Voc take place? You have to get all this information in this Blog. It is a very short Blog, if you want to see more details scroll through the entire blogs of Drona Foundation or Visit our Youtube Channel ( @DronaFoundationGujrat )

  • You will find heaps of B.Voc blogs but in this we want to give you all the information about B.Voc degree in a very short blog so let's have a look about what is B.Voc?. B.Voc is just a bachelor degree.It is also same as B.Com or B.Sc or B.A. This is also a three-year bachelor's degree.

  • UGC has started B.Voc in 2013-14 many people think it is a very new degree, no it has been 10 years since it was started in 2013-14 but very few students and parents know but after the National Education Policy 2020 this degree has got a tremendous boost. Let me tell you that before this National Education Policy, there were 200 colleges in the whole country.

  • Within a month of the coming of the National Education Policy, 1500 colleges in the whole country have started B.Voc, so you can understand how much emphasis has been placed on B.Voc, Government want that 50% from 3 crore and 85 lakh of the students studying in the whole country should do B.Voc.

  • I'm repeating that 3 crore 85 lakh students are studying in the whole country who are doing BA, B.Com, B.Sc, BBA. If the government says in the new education policy that 50% of the students should do B.Voc. You can understand how important this course will be. It is based on Germany's dual weight system. You may have heard a lot abroad that Students earn and pay their own expenses while studying.

What are the Eligibility criteria for doing B.Voc?

B.Voc degree has been launched. Anyone can do this degree after 12th standard in Arts, Commerce, Science. Anyone can take admission in this. It is not necessary that Commerce students can do it or Science students can do it. This degree is of three years because it is a bachelor degree then three years and 6 semesters are the same as in B.B.A., B.Com, B.Sc.

Inshort the students who have passed their 12th/HSC are eligible to pursue B.Voc.and also done after diploma.

B.Voc Specializations / How Many Types of Specializations can be done in B.Voc?

But now you will have a question about how many specializations can be done in some fields. There are about 65 specializations in B.Voc but in Gujarat we run programs of Drona Foundation in many colleges out of which you can do B.Voc in eight specializations in different fields.

  • First is Management and Entrepreneurship as BBA is a management course. If you want to become a manager or want to start your own business or already have a family business and want to add value to that business you can do a B.Voc in management and entrepreneurship.

  • Another one is B.Voc Information Technology which is done by any student who is looking for B.C.A, BSC IT then similarly now B.Voc Information Technology if you want to make a career in computer field you can do it,also if you want to make a career in software development.

  • One who wants to make a career in banking or financial services, or have to work with a chartered accountant. To make a career in auditing, in future CA, CFA want to do that, then all those students can do B.voc banking and finance.

  • Another great specialization is Ayurvedic Health Care Hospital Management and Patient Care Management that Science students can pursue. The funny thing is that till now Commerce and Arts students could not pursue a career in Medical.And now if you are a student of arts and commerce in medical and want to make a career in the medical field then you can do B.Voc health care or hospital management or patient care management course .

  • Another great course is B.Voc Design Fundamentals If you want to advance your career in Graphics Designing or Interior Designing or Fashion Designing then B.Voc Design Fundamentals is a great course at less cost than Bachelor of Design BS.

  • Whether you want to be a radio jockey, a video jockey, a news TV anchor, a YouTuber, or a journalist in the future, Media Journalism and Mass Communication B.Voc is for all students who are interested in this.

  • If you are a foodie or you want to start any food related dairy or bakery or something like that then you can do agro processing food processing your background is farming and you feel that I need to add value and do better business. Then you can do B.Voc in food processing, agro processing.

  • Your background is in farming and you feel that I want to add value and further do a better business, you can do food processing, agro processing. If you have your own farm, then you can do B.Voc Natural Farming or Organic Farming, now the demand of organic is increasing tremendously, the prices of organic products are double than what you get for normal products, so those who want to do can do B.Voc Organic Farming or Natural Farming .

Why B.Voc?/How is B.Voc different from other bachelor degrees?

  • You may be wondering why we have to do B.Voc?, There are degree for this all specializations like BSc Agriculture, B.Sc Organic Farming, BBA Finance, BSc Banking, Finance or B.Com, BSc Management, Bachelor of Journalism Mass, same common thing in that the traditional degrees till date were theory based.This all degree are focusing on theory and bookish knowledge and B.Voc is focusing on theory as well as practical knowledge.The students of B.Voc have on the job trainings and live projects.

  • In other degrees you have to go to college for 6 hours sitting in class and studying your particular course or rather if you are pursuing B.Voc, students have to attend class only for 2 hours and have to do internships or on the job training for 6 hours in companies which are related to particular specialization.

  • If you are doing B.Voc in Organic Farming than 60 percent you have to spend time on Organic Farm .If you do B.Voc in finance then you have to spend 60 percent of your time in a Chartered Accountant or Bank DSA. If you do B.Voc in management then you have to spend time in any management related company marketing, real estate, retail company.

  • Why B.Voc is important if you want to learn swimming, If someone teach you all day in the classroom PPT or by taking you to industrial visit i.e. visit swimming pool and show the swimming pool than you make a project report on swimming pool, Finally at the end of the semester you get 100 out of 100 marks in the exam, you have only knowledge swimming.

  • But if you want to learn swimming actually then you have to do swimming, if you want to swim then you have to actually jump into the swimming pool you can't learn swimming just from theory then similarly in management, finance, software development or communication, How can you do all these things, this was the big problem of our education system till now.

  • Students had only theoretical knowledge. Practicing knowledge was nothing. In the name of practical knowledge we do project reports of industrial visits but never do actual practice. When we go to do that practice after studying, people tell us that you are a fresher, when people tell you that, what you have studied is of no use to come here, something else is going on.

  • To prevent this from happening, the government has started a B.Voc degree. Because traditional courses are based on just theoretical knowledge, more than 50% of the graduates are unemployed, and most of the students are struggling with B.B.A., B.Com or B.Sc. Now what is the point of doing business or job doing something different because the field in which he got his degree doesn't work.

  • That knowledge has no meaning, so that this does not happen, B.Voc of has been started, you have to do B.Voc from the very first year i.e. from the first semester or from the second semester you have to start working in the companies of the field you want to go to or actually in a field.

What are the Benefits of B.Voc?

Education (Theory) + Experience (Practical) = Earning (Job + Stipend)

  • If you really do it, we have seen our record of students who do B.Voc, but 80% of the students have earned back the fees that they have paid for 3 years from the stipends only which is given by the companies where they are doing internships. Yes, you may not earn from the first year, but from the second year you will start earning slowly and by the third year, you will get back the amount of fees you have paid in three years. Government has brought such a great course.

  • Here you wear formal clothes, you pay fees in college and many students will create excitement that yes, when you go to the company, you can do internships, you can get money, you can earn and pay your fees from it, this is the only degree that Which can increase your bank balance with just your knowledge and experience.

  • An example you can also consider BCA and B.Voc IT student For the IT the field, BCA student will study theory for three years just like any other traditional course but here B.Voc student for three years will learn theory as well as daily internship in a finance company,in Bank DSA and will get to work.And now BCA student is a fresher, he has no experience, he will go to get a job and there is 3 crore 85 lakh students are searching for jobs, and B.Voc student has completed 3 years of graduation with 3 years of live experience in company.

  • You can know what this 3 year difference in your professional life is.If someone has done MBA and has three years of experience, look at it and ask what was the condition of your career three years ago and what is the condition after three years of experience. These 3 years make a huge difference.We will get a good job if we study for another 2 years after doing B.A.and in front of B.Voc student also do MBA, Executive MBA or M.Voc now how does Executive MBA and M.Voc also happen Same you just have to study 40% theory and 60% going to company now he has three years so he will get to do full time job, where is this student after doing full time job and who is mba student again he is MBA fresher again go back for job.

  • And this student has a B.Voc plus MBA and five years of banking and finance experience. Now think about it, if both people go to the bank for an interview, who will be selected first and if both of them are to be selected, who will be given the higher salary. Obviously the person with experience will come, that's why B.Voc becomes very necessary.That's why the government is pushing B.Voc a lot and that's why B.Voc has been given a lot of priority in the new education policy.

B.Voc Colleges and specializations In Gujarat

RK University City Campus (B.Voc college in Rajkot)

Address:

New 150 ft ring road, Mota Mauva,kalawad road,Rajkot, 360004

Specializations

  1. B.Voc in management and entrepreneurship (MEPS)
  2. B.Voc in banking and finance (BFSI)
  3. B.Voc in information technology (IT)
  4. B.Voc in Design fundamentals
